document_data.name: Nixoxious
document_data.mainbody: '''Nixoxious''' was a [[kraken priest]]ess and a member of the [[Cult of Talos]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Nixoxious was a [[tiefling]] who wore blue robes.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1491 DR]], Nixoxious led a group of [[berserker]]s from the Cult of Talos in an attack on the recently resettled town of [[Leilon]]. Their assault sent much of the town's inhabitants fleeing north along the [[High Road]]. The cultists captured a number of fishers and soldiers to use as [[human]] sacrifices to [[water elemental]]s that Nixoxious attempted to ritually conjure to destroy the town. However, a group of [[adventurers]] managed to defeat her after she began the ritual.
